description: cart pulled by two oxen at center, with man with staff leaning on PR ox; man wearing hat seated on ox at right; two men and a woman carrying a baby ride in cart; bagpiper and man dancing with scythe at right; three girls with bundle of grain at left, with pair of men behind them
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

top center, printed in black: [L\'ARTISTE.]; bottom center, printed in black: [LES MOISSONNEURS DANS LES MARAIS PONTINS.]; LLC, printed in black: [Léopold Robert Rome 1830.]; LRC, printed in black: [P. Mercuri dis. e inc. in Parigi 1831]; on back at LRC, in pencil: [840351]
provenance: Harry M. Drake, St. Paul; Estate of Harry M. Drake; bequeathed to MIA, 2013
signed: LLC, in the print: [LEOPOLD ROBERT / ROME 1830.]
title: Les Moissonneurs dans Les Marais Pontins
